Utilities

Switch creates a built-in utility classes to provide a quick and helpful approach to your elements.



Floats

An html element can easily manipulate by using these classes namely .left and .right. When using floats, make sure it clears the floats by using a class name ".clearfix". It should be put on the parent container. Another approach would be using a class name ".clear" in the bottom of the float classes.

Important!

In small screen (mobile devices), all floats element will be displayed as block.


Float to left


Float to right


HTML example markup
<div class="clearfix">
	<div class="left">...</div>
	<div class="right">...</div>
</div>
<div class="classname">
	<div class="left">...</div>
	<div class="right">...</div>
	<div class="clear"></div>
</div>


Force Floats

Since all the float classes is displayed as block on small screens, Switch makes it flexible by using these classes ".force-left" and .force-right to force the element to stay at floats. So if the element is meant to float to all devices, just use these two classes.

Float to left

Float to right


HTML example markup
<div class="force-left">...</div>
<div class="force-right">...</div>



Gutters

Adjustable Gutters for different spacing. For some reasons, gutters needed some breather, so these classes namely .gutter-small, .gutter-medium, .gutter-large, .gutter-xlarge makes it happen.


Gutter Small

grid 6
grid 6

Gutter Medium

grid 6
grid 6

Gutter Large

grid 6
grid 6

Gutter Extra Large

grid 6
grid 6

HTML example markup
<div class="row gutter-small">
	<div class="grid-6"> ... </div>
	<div class="grid-6"> ... </div>
</div>
<div class="row gutter-medium">
	<div class="grid-8"> ... </div>
	<div class="grid-4"> ... </div>
</div>
<div class="row gutter-large">
	<div class="grid-6"> ... </div>
	<div class="grid-6"> ... </div>
</div>
<div class="row gutter-xlarge">
	<div class="grid-6"> ... </div>
	<div class="grid-6"> ... </div>
</div>


Text Sizes

A simple reference for different text sizes.

This is a "small" text

This is a "medium" text

This is a "large" text

This is a "xlarge" text

HTML example markup
<p class="text-small">...</p>
<p class="text-medium">...</p>
<p class="text-large">...</p>
<p class="text-xlarge">...</p>


Text Alignment

Alignment of text made easy using these classes ".text-left", ".text-center", ".text-right". All the images inside of these classes will also be aligned properly.

Important!

If you need to align some content in different devices, use these class name's ".text-center-small", ".text-center-medium", ".text-center-default", and ".text-center-large".

If you want to center the content in all devices, but it happens one device needed to stay in default. Use these class name's ".text-center-except-small", ".text-center-except-medium", ".text-center-except-default", and ".text-center-except-large".

Text Left

Text Center

Text Right


HTML example markup
<div class="text-left">...</div>
<div class="text-center">...</div>
<div class="text-right">...</div>


Vertical Alignment

This is a very helpful utility class, if it needs to make the content vertically centered. Use a class name ".valign" followed by .valign-content. This is a simple and cross browser approach for vertically centered content.

Important!

For this to make it work, you will need to set a height in a class name ".valign".


Vertical Centered Text

Vertical Centered Image

Vertical Centered Button

Secondary

HTML example markup
<div class="valign">
	<div class="valign-content">...</div>
</div>


Helpers

Extra classes for easy access.

I am using class name ".indent". I am using class name ".display-block". I am using class name ".display-inline-block". I am using class name ".clear". I am using class name ".no-padding".
I am using class name ".no-margin".

HTML example markup

<div class="indent">...</div>
<div class="display-block">...</div>
<div class="display-inline-block">...</div>
<div class="cleark">...</div>
<div class="no-padding">...</div>
<div class="no-margin">...</div>
<div class="no-padding">...</div>


SASS Configuration Variables

// Grid Gutters for different spacing. (A layout fixes if you want some breather)
$grid-gutter-small: 10px !default;
$grid-gutter-medium: 14px !default;
$grid-gutter-large: 30px !default;
$grid-gutter-xlarge: 40px !default;

// Font Sizes
// Font Sizes for different text sizes.
$text-font-size-small: 12px !default;
$text-font-size-medium: 14px !default;
$text-font-size-large: 18px !default;
$text-font-size-xlarge: 22px !default;

// Horizontal Rule
// Horizontal Rule - Divider
$hr-border: 1px solid $color-tertiary !default;
$hr-margin-bottom: 20px !default;

// Indention
$indent: 20px !default;

See config.scss for complete reference.
